subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wolfenson and his partner, Harvey Ratner, returned N.B.A. basketball to Minnesota in 1989, nearly 30 years after the Lakers had departed for California.
snippet: Mr. Wolfenson and his partner, Harvey Ratner, returned N.B.A. basketball to Minnesota in 1989, nearly 30 years after the Lakers had departed for California.
